Control Codes

 Query for media change.
#define NUTBLKDEV_MEDIACHANGE   0x1201
 Query for media change.
#define NUTBLKDEV_INFO   0x1202
 Retrieve device information.
#define NUTBLKDEV_SEEK   0x1203
 Block seek request.

Mass storage block device driver.
